channel.title: Andrew Denta
channel.description: Hi! I am Andrew Denta. I make balloons and websites. Feel free to check out my various projects!

item.title: Pui Tak Balloons
item.description: We made a bunch of balloons at the Pui Tak Center!

item.title: Add.ninja
item.description: I wanted to do something about people wanting to support charity, but falling short on contributing. I figured a good solution to this problem would be a website that hosts sponsored content, and gives the proceeds to charity. This way, people would still be able to support charity passively.

item.title: 4letterwords.
item.description: Summer 2015, I started getting passionate about how I could use advertising to change the world. After trying to build an alarm clock that woke people up with video adâ€™s, I decided to make a mobile trivia game. I took an archive of Jeopardy Questions and filtered out all answers that were not four letters long. Ads only appear if you run out of points. Points are gained by typing in the answers correctly. Points are used to buy hints, which give you one of the letters needed for the correct answer.
